gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `IntangibleAssets` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `IntangibleAssets` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `IntangibleAssetsMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IntangibleAssetsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice` BEHOORT NIET gerapporteerd te worden, omdat `IntangibleAssetsCostPrice` gerapporteerd. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_IntangibleAssetsCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_IntangibleAssetsCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnNoExistence1_IntangibleAssetsActualCostPrice return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssetsMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_IntangibleAssetsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_IntangibleAssetsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssets` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_IntangibleAssets')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_IntangibleAssets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfIntangibleAssetsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IntangibleAssets` gerapporteerd met `ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis` en `IntangibleAssetsMember` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan `IntangibleAssets` zonder `ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis` en `IntangibleAssetsMember`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIntangibleAssetsMovementHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
